model

Class Preferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Preferences

  • public class Preferences
extends java.util.Observable
    Class that will hold all user preferences. Useful for toggling grid lines, choosing background map color and other configurations
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Pedro Sampaio
